item.title: From Discovery to Knowledge
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: GenAI is to software development what LiDAR is to archaeology: exceptional at discovery, insufficient for knowledge. The real value still lies in human judgment, context, and accountability.

item.title: Designing Around Constraints
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Explains why Git stores loose objects in 256 subdirectories keyed by the first two hash characters and how that simple layout optimizes filesystem performance and scalability.

item.title: Simulation Standard for Business Process Management
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: A foundational proposal arguing that while BPMN standardized process ‘flows’, the industry lacked a standard for the ‘physics’ of simulation—resources, costs, and time.
